de.akquinet.jbosscc.guttenbase.configuration
Interface DatabaseConfiguration

All Known Subinterfaces:
SourceDatabaseConfiguration, TargetDatabaseConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDatabaseConfiguration, DefaultSourceDatabaseConfiguration, DefaultTargetDatabaseConfiguration, DerbySourceDatabaseConfiguration, DerbyTargetDatabaseConfiguration, ExportDumpDatabaseConfiguration, GenericSourceDatabaseConfiguration, GenericTargetDatabaseConfiguration, H2DbSourceDatabaseConfiguration, H2DbTargetDatabaseConfiguration, HsqldbSourceDatabaseConfiguration, HsqldbTargetDatabaseConfiguration, ImportDumpDatabaseConfiguration, MsAccessSourceDatabaseConfiguration, MsAccessTargetDatabaseConfiguration, MsSqlSourceDatabaseConfiguration, MsSqlTargetDatabaseConfiguration, MySqlSourceDatabaseConfiguration, MySqlTargetDatabaseConfiguration, OracleSourceDatabaseConfiguration, OracleTargetDatabaseConfiguration, PostgresqlSourceDatabaseConfiguration, PostgresqlTargetDatabaseConfiguration
public interface DatabaseConfiguration

Implementations may execute specific initialization code before and after operations are executed.
